title: ChocolaTree Organic Oasis
description: Serving 100% organic, gluten free, and sugar free dishes prepared daily to-order with seasonal produce. Note that honey is used in many items. Has free wireless internet, an on-site garden, and hosts events. Previously named ChocolaTree Cafe. Note: Open 9am to 9 pm daily with except the 2nd Wednesday of each month when they open at 11am. Be sure to check their web site for seasonal / holiday hours.
